display_long_description:
# Do you like to punch things?!
Punch Bomb is an intense action arcade game where you punch things designed from the ground up for those who like a challenge!

This game **IS NOT EASY**

Climb the global leaderboards in 3 punchable game modes!

👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊
# Classic Mode



Survive for as long as you can while punching a variety of bombs away from you before they explode, racking up huge combos, hitting targets, and dodging dangerous laser obstacles!
[media]

👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊


# Blitz Mode

Regular bombs no longer explode in this mode, and targets extend your time. Go ballistic to try to get as high of a score as possible within the time limit!
[media]

👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊


# Challenge Mode
Complete a fun collection of small challenges that put your speed and accuracy to the test!
[media]
👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊💥👊

# Unique Cosmetics
Unlock a variety of unique cosmetics by **PLAYING THE GAME** if you're up for a good challenge! Each with their own unique particle effect!




[media]
